divs: sighting detailsi was standing in my friends front yard after riding bikes the summer of 1985 and turned to walk home when i saw a flash of light, like a spotlight passing on the tree tops closest to the road where i was walking. i looked up and saw a hoovering disc shining the light around the hill all around us. my friend went to tell his dad while me and another friend stood and continued to observe the movement of the spotlight and the disc's movements arcross the sky. when his dad returned he couldn't explain to us what it was and made us go home and said we shouldn't talk about it for fear that some people may not beleive us if we told them what we were seeing. i stood for a half hour mesmorized by what happened next. a bright red glowing light lowered from underneath the bright white disc shape, much smaller in size, about 1\20 the size of the white disc. the red ball of light continued to lower untill it was behind some trees where the red light began to move from left to right scanning it seemed for 25 mins while the white disc shaped object hoovered above. the red glowing light then returned to the spot where it first went behind the trees and slowly raised back upwards untill it was inside the white disk shape again. the white disc glowing even brighter than before, slowly faded away and then was gone as if it flew away very fast. i have no drawings or photos but i could render some sketchs if needed. the images are still very clear what i saw that night.
Object Shape: Disc, Egg, Fireball, Oval, Saturn-like, Star-like
